job.title: ONSITE Web Developer - Front End Web Development, HTML5, CSS3
job.description: If you are a Web Developer with 2 years of experience please read onbrbrWe have been around for over 20 years and have gained 3 billion in assets since 2019 We are looking to add team members who are willing to work onsite essential businessbrbrCurrently we are looking for a Web Developer who is selfmotivated and accountable that can also work in a collaborative environment We offer competitive salaries bonuses based on individual performance PTO and federal holidays to keep you happy  we ENCOURAGE you to take all PTO to keep refreshed and sharp at work We work hard and play hardbrbrWhat You Will Be Doingbrulli Maintain our current websites landing pages and related web propertieslili Construction of new websiteslili Frontend design and developmentlili Implement website personalization and AB testinglili Work with custom implementationsconnections with external web applicationslili Website Tag Managementlili Identify issuesbugs and troubleshoot accordinglylili Collaborate with and mentor other web developersbrliulWhat You Need for this Positionbrulli 2 years frontend web developmentlili HTML5 CSS3 Utilize organized and semantic code structure with emphasis on current standards and best responsive practiceslili JavaScript working knowledge of Vanilla JS jQuery and JS frameworks such as Angular React or Vuelili CMS Knowledge of how to develop custom code for Content Management Systemslili ADA Knowledge of and experience developing to the WCAG 20 AA levellili Exceptional organization with attention to the details while meeting your deadlineslili Creation and maintenance of documentationlili Familiarity of connecting with CRM systemslili Excellent communication skills and the ability to work independently and collaborate with team members on a fastpaced projectbrliulCollege degree in related field or equivalent experiencebrbrWhats In It for Youbrulli Competitive Compensation Packagelili Dental Medical and Visionlili 401Klili Bonuses SemiAnnually Based Off Individual Performancelili Self Managing  No Micromanagementlili Paid Parkinglili PTO 3 Weeks First Yearlili 8 Sick Dayslili Bank Holidays 910brliulSo if you are a Web Developer with experience please apply todaybrbrstronguEmail Your Resume In Word TobrbrustrongLooking forward to receiving your resume through our website and going over the position with you Clicking apply is the best way to apply but you may alsobrbrWendyWarnerCyberCoderscombrulliPlease do NOT change the email subject line in any way You must keep the JobID linkedin  WW21641918  in the email subject line for your application to be consideredbrliulWendy Warner  Associate Manager  CyberCodersbrbrApplicants must be authorized to work in the USbrbrstrongCyberCoders Inc is proud to be an Equal Opportunity EmployerbrbrstrongAll qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race color religion sex national origin disability protected veteran status or any other characteristic protected by lawbrbrstrongYour Right to Workstrong  In compliance with federal law all persons hired will be required to verify identity and eligibility to work in the United States and to complete the required employment eligibility verification document form upon hire
